/**
 * NODOC directive
 * @name xui.directive:xuiWizardSummary
 * @restrict E
 *
 * @requires xui.directive:xuiWizard
 *
 * @description
 * Xui Wizard Summary component.  Used inside of an xui-wizard to inject arbitrary html into the summary step.
 *
 **/
 
    // Use xui-wizard-summary below an xui-wizard to provide a heading containing HTML
    // <xui-wizard>
    //   <xui-wizard-summary>html content</xui-wizard-summary>
    // </xui-wizard>
export default class WizardSummary implements ng.IDirective {
    public restrict = "E";
    public require = "^xuiWizard";
    public transclude = true;
    public template = ""; // In effect remove this element!
    public replace = true;
    public link = (scope:ng.IScope, element:ng.IAugmentedJQuery, attr:ng.IAttributes,
                   wizard:xui.IWizard, transclude:ng.ITranscludeFunction) => {
        // Pass the summary to the xui-wizard controller so that it can be transcluded into the right place
        // in the template.
        // [The second parameter to transclude causes the elements to be cloned so that they work in ng-repeat]
        wizard.setSummaryStep(transclude(scope, angular.noop));
    };
}
